attributes.action: Ban the sale and use of fireworks unless a public display
attributes.additional_details: Fire works are very dangerous and often get into the hands of the wrong people and end up been misused , causing accidents and damage. The noise of fireworks is often disturbing and frightening to a lot of animals and humans , especially those in the older generation. I have created this petition to stop the sales and use of fireworks by members of the public unless been used by an organisation at a public event. For example local council firework displays.
attributes.background: Ban the sale and use of fireworks to the public unless been used for a public display organised by councils

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Limit the sale of fireworks to those running local council approved events only
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/732559
